title: Series A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement

obligations.description: Must participate in company sale if approved by majority holders (drag-along rights).
Must redeem shares if no qualified IPO by January 1, 2030.
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Shares must be redeemed at original purchase price plus accrued but unpaid dividends.

special_terms: Right to maintain ownership percentage in future financings (pro-rata rights).
Quarterly unaudited and annual audited financial statements (information rights).
Preferred stock investors participate pro-rata in remaining proceeds (participating preferred).

conditions.anti_dilution: Weighted average anti-dilution protection in down rounds.

termination_conditions: Contract may terminate upon the execution of a qualified IPO.
Contract will be negated if the redemption rights are exercised.
